right_external_models.description: External models for relations, by space separated: sps-file-storage-widgets sps-file-storage-module-widgets. For example for 'hero-section-blocks-to-sps-file-storage-widgets' in 'sps-website-builder', the exernal model is 'sps-file-storage-widgets'.

left_external_models.description: External models for relations, by space separated: sps-file-storage-widgets sps-file-storage-module-widgets
